mhs.src.storage.persistence.remote

Class MhsGoogleOAuth2

  • java.lang.Object
    • mhs.src.storage.persistence.remote.MhsGoogleOAuth2

  • public class MhsGoogleOAuth2
extends java.lang.Object
    MhsGoogleOAuth2 Google API Authentication via OAuth2 with refresh mechanism for MHS access. Allows single active credential. Functionality: Google Authenticator via browser
    Credential Storage and creator
    Instance Creator for:
    1. Oauth2
    2. httpTransport
    3. jsonFactory
    Author:
    Timothy Lim Yi Wen A0087048X
